bug.author: JawyZhang
bug.description: My dataset is a two-classes dataset. train with yolov3 and detect,but only one class, the other class is detected wrong in every pic,but when train with yolov3-tiny and detect with the weights, the result is right.

comments.comment:
@JawyZhang use tiny then?
then it performances well. So strange that yolov3 performances worse than tiny

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/JawyZhang>@JawyZhang</denchmark-link> recommend yolov5 for all future work. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5</denchmark-link>
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.

My dataset is a two-classes dataset. train with yolov3 and detect,but only one class, the other class is detected wrong in every pic,but when train with yolov3-tiny and detect with the weights, the result is right.
I got exactly the same error as yours. Could you please describe how you finally dealt with the problem on YOLOv3 (not tiny)?
